Judul: DIRECT ESTIMATION OF DISCRETE FLUID FACIES AND FLUID INDICATORS VIA A BAYESIAN SEISMIC PROBABILISTIC INVERSION AND A NOVEL EXACT PP-WAVE REFLECTION COEFFICIENT
